name: WP Remove Category from Archive title
author: PrajnaBytes

sections.description:
WP Remove Category, Author, Tag, Custom Prefixed Word from the title of the pages to help you hide and remove the in-built Category: Tag: Archive: Author: etc.

Simply install and activate the plugin, and it will work on almost all types of themes. In case of any issues or conflicts with plugins or themes, please let us know https://www.isrgrajan.com/contact.

Important: Some themes and page/post builders like Elementor may not be supported.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from the WordPress Plugin Repository.
  2. Install the plugin.
  3. Activate the plugin.
  4. Remove the cache if you are using any cache plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Updated in compliance with the latest version of WordPress.
  • Made compatible with PHP 8.1.

1.0

  • Updated in compliance with the latest version of WordPress.

0.0.9

  • Bug fix.
  • Added support for PHP 8.
  • Tested up to WordPress 6.2.

0.0.8

  • Tested and updated to support the latest version of WordPress.
  • Added support for PHP 8.1.12.

0.0.7

  • Tested and updated to support the latest version of WordPress.

0.0.6

  • Added support to hide/remove category, author, custom pages, and tag archive pages.
  • Upgraded to support the latest version of WordPress.

0.0.5

  • Tested and upgraded version to support WordPress 5.8.

0.0.4

  • Tested and upgraded version to support WordPress 5.6.

0.0.3

  • Tested and upgraded version to support WordPress 5.6.

0.2

  • Added support for the latest WordPress release 5.5.1.

0.1

  • Initial release Version 0.1.
